Try it

cURL

Python

JavaScript

Go

Java

Copy

```
curl --request POST \
  --url https://app.chatwoot.com/public/api/v1/inboxes/{inbox_identifier}/contacts/{contact_identifier}/conversations/{conversation_id}/messages \
  --header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  --data '{
  "content": "Hello, how can I help you?",
  "echo_id": "1234567890"
}'
```

#### Path Parameters

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/create-a-message#parameter-inbox-identifier)

inbox\_identifier

string

required

The identifier obtained from API inbox channel

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/create-a-message#parameter-contact-identifier)

contact\_identifier

string

required

The source id of contact obtained on contact create

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/create-a-message#parameter-conversation-id)

conversation\_id

integer

required

The numeric ID of the conversation

#### Body

application/json

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/create-a-message#body-content)

content

string

Content for the message

Example:

`"Hello, how can I help you?"`

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/create-a-message#body-echo-id)

echo\_id

string

Temporary identifier which will be passed back via websockets

Example:

`"1234567890"`

#### Response

200

200401

application/json

Success

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/create-a-message#response-id)

id

string

Id of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/create-a-message#response-content)

content

string

Text content of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/create-a-message#response-message-type)

message\_type

string

Denotes the message type

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/create-a-message#response-content-type)

content\_type

string

Content type of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/create-a-message#response-content-attributes)

content\_attributes

string

Additional content attributes of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/create-a-message#response-created-at)

created\_at

string

Created at time stamp of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/create-a-message#response-conversation-id)

conversation\_id

string

Conversation Id of the message

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/create-a-message#response-attachments)

attachments

object\[\]

Attachments if any

[​](https://developers.chatwoot.com/api-reference/messages-api/create-a-message#response-sender)

sender

object

Details of the sender
